front.title: IEEE Standard for Information technology

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Superseded by 802.1D-2004. This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1D, 1998 Edition is intended to documentmaintenance items identified in the text of IEEE Std 802.1D, 1998 Edition (ISO/IEC 15802-3:1998). The document identifies any proposed changes to the text that have arisen as aconsequence of maintenance activity. These are documented in the usual form for Amendments toIEEE 802Ã¢ standards; i.e., as an explicit set of editing instructions that, if correctly applied to thetext of ISO/IEC 15802-3:1998, will create a corrected document.
